segment.source: App-V 4.6 Release Notes
segment.target: App-V 4.6 Release Notes

segment.source: App-V 4.6 Release Notes
segment.target: App-V 4.6 Release Notes

segment.source: App-V 4.6 Release Notes
segment.target: App-V 4.6 Release Notes

segment.source: To search these Release Notes, press CTRL+F.
segment.target: To search these Release Notes, press CTRL+F.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Read these Release Notes thoroughly before you install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Management System.
segment.target: Read these Release Notes thoroughly before you install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Management System.

segment.source: These Release Notes contain information that you need to successfully install Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6.
segment.target: These Release Notes contain information that you need to successfully install Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6.

segment.source: This document contains information that is not available in the product documentation.
segment.target: This document contains information that is not available in the product documentation.

segment.source: If there is a discrepancy between these Release Notes and other App-V documentation, the latest change should be considered authoritative.
segment.target: If there is a discrepancy between these Release Notes and other App-V documentation, the latest change should be considered authoritative.

segment.source: Protect Against Security Vulnerabilities and Viruses
segment.target: Protect Against Security Vulnerabilities and Viruses

segment.source: To help protect against security vulnerabilities and viruses, it is important to install the latest available security updates for any new software being installed.
segment.target: To help protect against security vulnerabilities and viruses, it is important to install the latest available security updates for any new software being installed.

segment.source: For more information, see the Microsoft Security Web site (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=3482).
segment.target: For more information, see the Microsoft Security Web site (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=3482).

segment.source: Known Issues with Application Virtualization 4.6
segment.target: Known Issues with Application Virtualization 4.6

segment.source: This section provides the most up-to-date information about issues with Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6.
segment.target: This section provides the most up-to-date information about issues with Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6.

segment.source: These issues do not appear in the product documentation and in some cases might contradict existing product documentation.
segment.target: These issues do not appear in the product documentation and in some cases might contradict existing product documentation.

segment.source: Whenever possible, these issues will be addressed in later releases.
segment.target: Whenever possible, these issues will be addressed in later releases.

segment.source: Load/install error running a Windows Installer file generated by the App-V 4.5 Sequencer
segment.target: Load/install error running a Windows Installer file generated by the App-V 4.5 Sequencer

segment.source: Running a Windows Installer file generated by the App-V 4.5 Sequencer produces a load/install error when trying to run it on an App-V 4.6 client.
segment.target: Running a Windows Installer file generated by the App-V 4.5 Sequencer produces a load/install error when trying to run it on an App-V 4.6 client.

segment.source: You will see the following message: "This package requires Microsoft Application Virtualization Client 4.5 or later".
segment.target: You will see the following message: "This package requires Microsoft Application Virtualization Client 4.5 or later".

segment.source: Please use the following workaround.
segment.target: Please use the following workaround.

segment.source: WORKAROUND Open the old package with either the App-V 4.5 SP1 Sequencer or the App-V 4.6 Sequencer and generate a new .msi file for the package.
segment.target: WORKAROUND Open the old package with either the App-V 4.5 SP1 Sequencer or the App-V 4.6 Sequencer and generate a new .msi file for the package.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Alternatively, at the command prompt, the App-V Sequencer can generate the new .msi file by using the /OPEN and /MSI parameters, for example, .
segment.target: Alternatively, at the command prompt, the App-V Sequencer can generate the new .msi file by using the /OPEN and /MSI parameters, for example, .

segment.source: For more information, see How to Upgrade a Virtual Application by Using the Command Line.
segment.target: For more information, see How to Upgrade a Virtual Application by Using the Command Line.
